changes: Added slash commands.
Bug fixes.
Bug fixes and improvements.
Bug fixes.
Bug fixes.
Fixed `setup` slash command. (`Cannot destructure property 'guildId' of 'message' as it is undefined.`)
Added role parameter checking for `setup` slash command.
Some embeds didn't render properly.
Added `changelog` command.
Select menus/filters didn't work when there were no pages.
Fixed rare error when using slash commands: Message won't edit and bot crashes.
Improved the "moderator" permissions manager.
Fixed moderator action permissions and conditions. Moderators/admins were able to make moderation actions on members with higher hierarchy than them.
Fixed same audit-logs sending more than once occasionally.
Fixed `server-info` command: Information wasn't displaying.
Fixed `mcstatus`, `purge`, `role` and `setup` commands: Some slash sub-commands didn't work.
Fixed clock emoji on `times` command.
Removed "Server id" footer from server audit-logs.
Any data collected by the bot will now be deleted if it leaves the server.
Fixed `purge` command: Possible crashes when using the `after` sub-command.
The `to-do` command now displays the number of the new item.
Added `boosts` sub-module to audit-logs module.
Added timestamps on `changelog` command.
Fixed embed dysplaying of `mod-logs` and `infractions` commands.
Fixed `warn` command: It wouldn't save the moderator in the database (missing data).
Added on and off emojis to the `modules` command.
Back-end improvements for better performance.
Fixed `to-do` command: Threw error when using the `add` sub-command for the first time.
Fixed `times` command: Threw casual error when using the prefixed version of it.
Added support for Group DM invites in both `invite-info` command and `audit-logs/invites` sub-module.
Changed "Id" to "ID" in some commands, to be grammatically correct.
Modified polls database structure. This will most likely break all current active polls, meaning they wont be able to end by their own.
Now the end date and duration of a poll will be displayed automatically at the end of the message.
Added `legal` command.
Added the bot's **Terms of Service (ToS)** and **Privacy Policy.** Access them with the `legal` command.
